item.title: 10 Best Slasher Horror Movies Of The 2020s, So Far

item.title: Genius New Star Wars Theory Is THE Best Way To Bring KotOR Back Into Canon - & Pay Off The Rise Of Skywalker's Best Idea At Last
item.description: The Rise of Skywalker had a compelling but underutilized idea, one that can be explored perfectly in a canon Knights of the Old Republic story.
